dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Hello! Nice to see you!

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Hello! Good evening. This restaurant is beautiful.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Yes, it is. I like this table here.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Me too. Where is the waiter?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: There! Excuse me, can we see the menu please?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Thank you. Everything looks delicious.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: I would like the fish with white wine, please.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: And I would like the same. Is there a bathroom here?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Yes, it's there, by the bar.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Perfect. I'll be right back.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: The food is here! It's delicious!

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Yes, very good. Cheers!

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Cheers!

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Excuse me, can we have the bill please?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: How much is it?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: It's not too expensive. Do you have cash?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: No, sorry. I don't have cash. Just my card.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: That's okay. I can pay with cash.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Thank you! I'll pay next time.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: No problem. Goodbye!

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Goodbye! See you later!
